change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: This collection is a typescript list of the University of Arizona varsity lettermen from 1897-1964.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: University of Arizona Varsity Lettermen (AZ 071). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of J.F. McKale, 1965.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Coach and Director of Athletics, University of Arizona, 1914-1959.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into a chronological list.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection is a typescript list of the University of Arizona varsity lettermen from 1897-1964.
